The effects of childhood obesity are extensive and profound on almost all aspects of a child's wellbeing. A child suffering from obesity or overweight problem may experience severe health complications in association with psychological and emotional hazards. Some of the physical effects of childhood obesity include type 2 diabetes, high blood pressure, and sleep apnea.
